Quickstrike:



"What?" Quickstrike turned his head to Drill Bit. "Ah jus' got here, 
an' we're leavin'? What uh waste of mah time!" He extended his arm 
out into the battlefield and fired three times, not counting on 
hitting any targets. He just needed to let of a little steam.
